directions.step:
Mix all together. Beat 4 minutes at medium speed Bane in ungreased tube pan 40 minutes at 350 degrees.
TOPPING FOR APRICOT NECTAR CAKE:
1/3 cup orange juice, 1 1/2 cups powdered sugar.
Mix and pour over hot cake. Leave cake in pan till cool.
Source: Recipes Out of This World Women of St. Agnes Catholic Church Charleston, WV 1969
billspa@icanect.net
Recipe by: Emily Lamb
